column5: of course we can chase some Simcoe Whistling Trout (suckers) and there is the Orillia Perch Derby (21 April to May 12, 2007) in the meantime...can't wait
I,ll have to get you out there Beans on the red rocket. Just let me know when
Thanks for the offer Brian...Can we make it after the bass season opens ?  I sure would like to tangle with some of those hogs in there...
Beans, is it true that fer the Orillia Perch Festival the Perch wear colorful costumes and  hats?
Geeze Jed...Just like deja vue all over again...  Wasn't this same question asked last year on the old board ???
Eee doggies Beans! I was a wonderin' if'n you'd recall? Sure 'nuf, but as Pickerel Paul.
